wikipedia_page.main: Alexander Cribley (born 1 April 1957) is an English former footballer who played as a central defender. He spent the majority of his playing career at Wigan Athletic, and made over 250 appearances for the club. He is now part of the staff at Wigan, working as a physiotherapist. He was part of the team that won the Associate Members' Cup in 1985.

response: * Alex Cribley, footballer, Liverpool F.C. & Wigan Athletic F.C.
